description:
Kenshiro and the others leave Southern Cross behind. They run afoul of Kemda and the Fang Clan, but defeat them easily.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Ni Bu: Fuuun Ryuukohen - Ore o Matsu no wa Tatakai Dake na no ka!!
Part Two: The Tumultuous Dragon and Tiger! Only Battles Waits for Me?!
第二部 風雲龍虎編 俺を待つのは 戦いだけなのか!!
